meanings.definition: In a way that can be easily carried or moved.
meanings.sent1: She packed her clothes portably in a small suitcase for the weekend trip.
meanings.sent2: The backpack was designed to be worn portably on the shoulders.
meanings.sent3: Carrying the picnic basket portably made it easier to walk through the park.
meanings.sent4: The tiny kitten moved portably in the palm of her hand.
meanings.sent5: The fragile vase was transported portably to avoid any damage.

meanings.sent1: The lightweight chair was portably carried to the beach for the picnic.

meanings.sent4: Her small purse was as portably as a feather in her hand.
meanings.sent5: The foldable table was so portably that even a child could move it.

meanings.definition: Able to be used on different devices or systems without modification.
meanings.sent1: The software was designed to be portably compatible with various operating systems.
meanings.sent2: The USB drive was portably used on both the laptop and desktop computers.
meanings.sent3: The universal remote control was portably programmed to work with all devices.
meanings.sent4: Her adaptable mindset allowed her to portably adjust to any situation.
meanings.sent5: The language translation app was so portably that it worked seamlessly on any smartphone.
